name: Seconds Torpedo
additionalNotes: The seconds of this Nicaraguan “puro”, handmade by Perdomo is made with tobacco from the Nicaraguan regions of Jalapa and Esteli, using the complex, aromatic tobaccos of the Jalapa valley with the fuller bodied tobaccos of Esteli. Tabacalera Perdomo has created a smooth, medium bodied blend, graced with a rich Nicaraguan sungrown wrapper that offers a rich, satisfying finish.
